metadata.name: TBoI:Deliverance
metadata.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Jc9ctD.png[/img] No, this mod doesn’t add any [i]new floors[/i], [i]huge bosses[/i] or [i]anything like that[/i]. We’ve put some cute monsters and items which we'd like to see in the game! In general, [b]Deliverance [/b]adds: [b]39[/b] new [b]items[/b]! [b]7[/b] [b]trinkets[/b], [b]3 cards[/b], [b]new heart[/b] and a [b]new pill[/b]! [b]20+[/b] new [b]enemies[/b]! [b]900+[/b] new [b]rooms[/b]! [b]Secrets![/b] External item descriptions [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]compatibility![/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/EaCyIkj.png[/img] [b]Also[/b] We've finally finished the [b]tBoI: Deliverance Manual[/b], containing information about all content! [b]We'll be adding new information and update the manual as new updates are released![/b] [url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vSZee5gnxBuuNmVaKBklB0OJ-43BUhWKkCSi2qDJXiT-F1ruCfz6EhKjs-hQeTn6Jo1u2w9680h8WOB/pub?embedded=true]ENG[/url] [url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vQHE9UWX5IS6o7y7nu7Qo9SUiOt761zK9j3_f283lFydhhTBcgVEJjHJUSgbPRz1WdKORXdcfhGMFpI/pub?embedded=true]RU[/url]
Feel free to join our [url=discord.gg/PKgV5nf]discord server![/url]
[h1]Credits[/h1] [b]Doctor Hummer:[/b] programmer, artist and room designer. [b]Baicherra: [/b]incredible artist, room designer. [b]Instrex: [/b]awesome programmer [b]Kovadon: [/b]artist, the guy who made an amazing logo you can see above!
[h1]Special thanks[/h1] To [b]AgentCucco[/b], [b]Budjmt[/b], [b]BogdanRudyka[/b], [b]Minichibis[/b], [b]Der Clown[/b], [b]Eternal Necromancer[/b], [b]Modding of Isaac Community[/b] and [b]You[/b]! [img]https://i.imgur.com/cAYjYgW.png[/img]
